name: Ultimate Car Driving City St
description:
Ultimate Car Driving City St is the latest simulation game where you can learn to drive different kind of vehicles. Fasten your seat belt; drive safe and do not exceed the speed limit. Follow traffic signals otherwise the city traffic police will charge you fine for violation. Drive on genuine streets in expensive cars and respond to normal obstructions. Go through the rigorous school driver training and get grip of drift skills. Test drive super cars at to enhance your driving abilities.
Features:
- Experience real city driving school game
- Take out multiple cars in real city traffic
- Real engine sounds
- Realistic weather conditions
- Well designed testing paths for professional driver training
- Realistic auto physics & smooth accelerator and brake controls
- Amazing 3D graphics.
